DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the vaccination status, knowledge about vaccination, and attitude to vaccination of the Korean patients with inflammatory bowel diseases
DOC.brief_title: Vaccination Status, Knowledge and Attitude in Korean Patients With IBD
DOC.detailed_description: Using structured questionnaires, the vaccination status, knowledge about vaccination, and attitude to vaccination of the Korean patients with inflammatory bowel diseases will be investigated. The descriptive analyses will be performed and the factors influencing the vaccination status, knowledge, and attitude will be investigated.
DOC.criteria: Crohn's disease or ulcerative colitis Patients who are visiting Asan Medical Center for the first time for the management of inflammatory bowel diseases Patients who give consent for participating in the study Patients who refuse to participate in the study
